title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump `Very Bad' Comment, Future of Ford
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump `Very Bad' Comment, Future of Ford
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUESTS: Matthew Miller Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing President Trump's comment that Germany was "very bad" on trade during a closed-door meeting with European Union officials in Brussels on Friday. Keith Naughton Auto Editor at Large Bloomberg News Discussing his Bloomberg Businessweek story "Ford Has Some Catching Up To Do"and the future of the auto maker under new CEO Jim Hackett.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
